avdta.network.node

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.node.Location
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ICoordinate
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Node

    public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, ICoordinate
    This class stores the location and elevation of a node.
    x Stores the abscissa of the location of a node.
    y Stores the ordinate of the location of a node.
    elevation Stores the elevation of a node.
    See Also:
    Node, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Location()
      Instantiates this Location as (0, 0)
      Location(double x, double y)
      Instantiates this Location with (x, y).
      Location(ICoordinate rhs)
      Constructs this Location from the specified ICoordinate, using its latitude and longitude
      Location(Location rhs)
      Instantiates the location of a node with (rhs.x, rhs.y)
